short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your DeepFabric co-pilots right in your new tab, and take your productivity to the next level.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DeepFabric delivers intelligent agents that do work at your fingertips. 
 
Find instant solutions to your problems, and get all of that work done on DeepFabric.
 
With the DeepFabric Chrome Extension:
 
Access the most advanced productivity-focused AI
•         Create, work with and chat with your own team of AIs built from Tedi - DeepFabric's advanced AI more powerful than GPT-4
•         Manage your threads better with folders, and easy reordering
 
Manage all your tasks instantly
Add tasks to DeepFabric from any webpage. Instantly place tasks into any project. Effortlessly compose a task description and delegate it to a team member. Choose the right assignee using a dropdown menu. Incorporate custom fields into your new tasks. Capture the current URL as a task for later reading or to share with colleagues.
 
Manage your meetings more effectively
•         Store meeting notes efficiently
•         Attend meetings with one click
 
Instantly access all your notes
Capture ideas, tasks, and information effortlessly with a feature-rich note-taking module. Seamlessly clip content from the web, engage in document collaboration, and customize workspaces using versatile templates. Enjoy real-time co-editing, intelligent categorization, and integrated task management for a streamlined workflow. Keep knowledge interconnected with smart linking, ensuring insights translate into action, all within a single, organized framework.
 
Do everything quickly
•         Instant access to your most visited websites
•         Store screenshots, bookmarks, and text to Notes instantly
•         Attend meetings with one click
•         Use the focus timer to get work done without distractions
 
Get physically quicker!
•         Learn fast typing
•         Practice shortcuts
